thread.title: Last day of International Food Festival
thread.title_full: Last day of International Food Festival | Channel - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Last day of International Food Festival
text:
Jean-Christophe Novelli Credit: Steve Parsons / PA Archive/PA Images Guernsey's International Food Festival ends today. Entertainment will include a live show from famous chef, Jean-Christophe Novelli.
The festival is the first of its kind and has included food tours, cocktail tasting, a Guernsey market and cooking masterclasses.
Yesterday saw hundreds turn out for the Beer and Cider Festival in Market Square.
Today people can watch Jean-Christopheâ€™s skills live in action in two demonstrations at the Seafront Sunday Live Food Show.
Last updated Sun 27 Sep 2015 Entertainment Guernsey
